titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a certain portion of the Delaware River in the States of Pennsylvania and New Jersey as a study area for potential addition to the wild and scenic rivers system.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 11/4/1987--Introduced. Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Delaware River in Pennsylvania and New Jersey for study for inclusion in the wild and scenic rivers system. Authorizes appropriations.
